title: ip glitch
body:
hey riot, my ip count is currently 4820, and i wanna buy a champ, but in store, the client instore says i have 3955?
plz help asap

replies.body:
Hey Don,

Thanks for the report - we're investigating what is causing this problem, and will keep everyone updated in this thread [here.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug)
